ca.teamTen.recitopia.activities
Class RecipeEditActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.teamTen.recitopia.activities.RecipeEditActivity

public class RecipeEditActivity
extends Activity

This activity loads or creates a Recipe object when launched. When the activity finishes it returns the modified or newly created recipe.

createRecipe

public Recipe createRecipe()
This method creates a new Recipe object from the currently modified text fields as well as any newly added ingredients and/or photos.

Returns:
a Recipe object representing the current Recipe
